emailRecruitment.subject: IMMEDIATE ACTION REQUESTED`: Eirist Crisis Response Simulation
emailRecruitment.request: Your immediate participation is requested for our emergency crisis simulation. This simulation is designed to keep you safe from disinformation as our the current crisis unfolds.
emailRecruitment.information: The Civic Resilience Project is at the forefront of strategies for effective crisis management and public education in times of uncertainty.
emailRecruitment.sendOff: In this critical moment, your choices and insights can make a difference. Act now.
emailRecruitment.footer: Empowering communities through knowledge and resilience.

instructions.title: Welcome to the Civic Resilience Simulation
instructions.introduction: This tool was developed by the Civic Resilience Project for times just like these—when disinformation threatens weaken our nation during an election.
instructions.engageScenarios: 1. Play a simulated version of the ongoing crisis.
instructions.informedDecisionMaking: 2. Create a narrative about who's to blame.
instructions.criticalAnalysis: 3. Watch your narrative impact the outcome of the crisis—for better or for worse.
instructions.conclusion: This simulation is more than an exercise; it's a vital part of our country's response strategy.
instructions.readyToBegin: Are you ready to begin? Your help is crucial, now more than ever.

briefing.title: Crisis Overview
briefing.note: This briefing includes factual information from the government and trusted news outlets. NB! Due to the chaotic nature of the crisis, some details may change.

natureOfCrisis.description: 1. Cyber attacks struck Eirist during our country's national elections. It is unclear who is behind the cyber attacks and why.

affectedAreas.description: 2. The cyber attacks left rural Eirist without elecrity. The countryside is dark and chaos is emerging.

responseMeasures.description: 3. Our election has been postponed. Authorities in Eirist are investigating who committed these attacks and why.

briefing.conclusion: Use this information to guide your decisions.
briefing.reminder: And remember: stay alert to new developments as the crisis unfolds. We will provide live updates if necessary.

selectFactsInstructions.title: Instructions
selectFactsInstructions.introduction: You are about to begin. Once you click "Start", you will be overwhelmed with information—just like real life.

examine.title: 1. Read The Facts
examine.description: All of this information is true. However, you will learn to manipulate it.

selection.title: 2. Make Your Selection
selection.description: Choose 3 to 5 facts that you want to focus on to tell your misleading narrative.

timely.title: 3. Be Timely
timely.description: You have a limited time to make your selections, reflecting the real-world pressure of decision-making during emergencies. If you run out of time, random facts will be automatically selected for you.

selectFactsInstructions.impact: What you choose will impact the simulation.

buildNarratives.title: Choose Someone to Blame
buildNarratives.instructions: Make your selections to build your unique narratives, which you will see on the next page.

instructions.introduction: Choose one narrative that you think will cause the most dangerous impact on society.

narrativeImpact.introduction: Observe your chosen narrative taking over society.

introduceEvent.introduction: Watch your narrative absorb the new events. See how it impacts the election outcome.
introduceEvent.popup: An unexpected event is randomly introduced.

update.title: SYSTEM ALERT: Live Update to Crisis
update.introduction: While you've been playing this simulation, the ongoing crisis has continued to unfold.
update.challenge: We have flagged your fictional narrative because it resembles one of the real narratives that is currently circulating on social media.
update.response: We will move you to a new stage of the game to strategize ways to combat this narrative.

pivot.title: SYSTEM ALERT: Live Update to Crisis
pivot.introduction: Now, the aim has changed. You will 1) identify what is missing from the misleading narrative, and 2) come up with an effective correction.
pivot.task: On the next screen, you will get the chance to revise your original fact selection from earlier. Try to selected facts that will help to disprove your narrative.

identifyWeaknesses.instructions: Select and deselect information to create a more accurate narrative.

identifyStrategies.title: Select Two Counternarrative Strategies
identifyStrategies.instructions: Choose two counterstrategies that you think would be the best to combat your narrative. But select carefully--some strategies work better than others. Your choice could determine whether the election ends in peace or conflict.

updatedNarrativeImpact.introduction: Choose one counter narrative that you think most people will believe.

gameLesson.title: Thank you for playing Reality Check!
gameLesson.introduction: Even true facts can be manipulated into false stories. Your best defense against disinformation is recognizing what is being left out of the conversation—it's far more than only spotting lies.
gameLesson.conclusion: Stay aware, stay critical. Information is data. Your attention matters more than you might realize.

repeatPopup.title: What do you think about the way your story ended?
repeatPopup.instructions: You will now repeat the first part of the game. Try to create a new election outcome by crafting a different narrative.
